body: Part 2 of post #395581 (translated). People now perceive Rui as a girl. At school, Rui became the football team's manager. Thanks to Lily's influence, she gets more attractive the more she had sex, and her sexual drive is also stronger now. Lily helped him get off once, after that they charmed Daiki (Rui's best friend) to think she's his girlfriend. While they have sex, Rui kind of feeling jealous because her partner keep talking of other woman. The next day, she became more conscious of the guys' gaze and decided to just go with it. She changed her hairstyle, and found interest in dressing up. She's starting to enjoy her new sex life.
